about_the_game:
Created by Riley D. Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consists of 25 top-down uniquely designed, 3d rendered tokens, depicting heroes, villains and monsters. You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules. Just unlock the encounters and drag these over top or drag them over top of the listing in your combat tracker.

This Token Pack includes:

  • Black Bear the Barbarian
  • Caped Archer
  • Conan the Conqueror
  • Cyclops Attacker
  • Gorgon
  • Hannibal
  • Hoplite
  • Medjai archer
  • Medjai Spearman 2
  • Medjai Swordsman
  • Medusa
  • Medusan with Spear
  • Prospero
  • Proto-human Shaman with Staff
  • Proto-human with Bone Axe
  • Proto-human with Club
  • Proto-human with Stone Axe
  • Tigra
  • Troglodyte Axeman
  • Troglodyte Bladesman
  • Troglodyte Savage
  • Troglodyte Shaman
  • Troglodyte Spearman
  • Warrior with Chakram
  • Warrior with Gladius

Requires: A Fantasy Grounds full or ultimate license or an active subscription and any Ruleset.
detailed_description:
Created by Riley D. Owens (aka Darkwoulfe), this product consists of 25 top-down uniquely designed, 3d rendered tokens, depicting heroes, villains and monsters. You can use these to replace the letter tokens or built-in tokens in many popular adventure modules. Just unlock the encounters and drag these over top or drag them over top of the listing in your combat tracker.

This Token Pack includes:

  • Black Bear the Barbarian
  • Caped Archer
  • Conan the Conqueror

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
